about_the_game:
Bite-Sized Scares

Is a completely free, small collection of short and sweet, bite sized indie horror games created and curated by Aaron Wise & D. Zenith.

The games are playable through a fun and interactive launcher, with each game featuring their own unique setting, narrative, and gameplay mechanics.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FEATURED IN THIS COLLECTION:

Statuam

  • Your friends dared you to enter the mysterious maze, dubbed 'Domum Statuae'. Stories of a demonic statue that stalks its prey throughout the maze are all that runs though your mind, but you aren't one to chicken out. Get in, get out. How hard can it be?

The Bewdley Incident

  • A short game of "Guess Who" where a Skinwalker has taken over the small town where you live. Assess the situation, look for the signs, and execute the Skinwalker before it's too late! Randomly selects a new Skinwalker with each playthrough with 4 endings to find.

A Date to Remember

  • Sometimes it's best to let sleeping corpses lie. You take the role of a young, single woman, attempting to find love in these trying times. The person you've taken an interest in, invites you to dinner at his beloved grandmother's house. Though as with all dates, people don't show their true colors right away.

The Nest

  • Something lives down inside the darkest part of the mines. With the creature on the prowl, you must avoid detection, find resources to build a makeshift bridge & escape. Be careful, though. It's not the only thing down there.

Mile Marker 1

  • Made in collaboration with Gwobo the creator of the acclaimed Adult Swim Analog Horror series. Mile Marker 1 see's you play out sections of the story, choose what happens, & experience a new section of the story not seen previously. Using real footage, this FMV/Gameplay hybrid will make you scared long after the credits have finished.

--And more to come in the form of post-launch updates!

content_descriptors.notes: Some games contain chase scenes that contain sustained threats, which some players may find stressful.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7-5820K / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Audio
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan is necessary for some games.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 9th Gen / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 8GB / AMD RX 6600 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Audio
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan is necessary for some games.

short_description: Bite-Sized Scares is a small collection of short, retro, indie horror games; created by Aaron Wise & D. Zenith. Strap in, grab some snacks and get ready for some spooks!
